Comment: IMPORTANT BABY LAMB RELATED UPDATE: "The borough of Rosemont-La Petite-Patrie has approved a plan to bring about fifteen lambs and sheep to Pelican Park this July. Their task? Eat grass.The pilot project comes following a proposal last year from Mathyas Lefebure, who was a shepherd in France for a decade before moving to Montreal.He says grazing sheep is an environmentally-friendly way to maintain and fertilize green spaces. He also wants to use sheep to educate city dwellers about farming."cbc.ca/news/canada/montr…
